title: Ask Us: Libraries - Northwestern University
content: Need research help? Our librarians are available to assist you. Call, email, live chat or just stop by. Note that while our text, email and live chat services are intended for use by Northwestern students, faculty and staff, we will also attempt to answer questions from the general public. Our subject librarians are subject-matter experts who can be contacted for research help, classroom instructions, purchase of library materials and more. Visit our Subject LibrarianÂ webpage for contact information and to access our research subject guides. In-depth research assistance is available through one-on-one research consultations. Complete our online Research Consultation Appointment Request form to get started. For detailed help in specific areas you may wish to contact the following departments or libraries: Consult our FAQs for answers to common questions across a variety of topics.
